body_html:
@apaszke maybe my confusion comes from the fact that

isinstance({}, collections.Iterable) == True

Anyway, my idea was just to unite all those new modules in a single one, so that we don't grow it for each new container type (ModuleNamedTuple, ModuleSet, etc).

But that's just a minor comment.

body:
@apaszke maybe my confusion comes from the fact that
```python
isinstance({}, collections.Iterable) == True
```
Anyway, my idea was just to unite all those new modules in a single one, so that we don't grow it for each new container type (`ModuleNamedTuple`, `ModuleSet`, etc).

But that's just a minor comment.
